name: Flora Care Dashboard
description: A clean and intuitive mobile dashboard for managing plant care, featuring a light theme and circular image containers.

atoms.name: Pill Button
atoms.description: Small, rounded button for quick actions.
atoms.css: padding: 4px 12px; border-radius: 9999px; background-color: #E0E0E0; color: #000000; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 500; border: none; cursor: pointer;

atoms.name: Section Heading
atoms.description: Clear and concise heading for sections.

atoms.name: Bottom Navigation Bar
atoms.description: Simple bottom navigation bar with icons.
atoms.css: display: flex; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; padding: 16px; background-color: #FFFFFF; border-top: 1px solid #E0E0E0;

atoms.name: Circular Image Container
atoms.description: Container for images with a circular crop.
atoms.css: width: 80px; height: 80px; border-radius: 50%; overflow: hidden; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;

best_for: Apps requiring a clean and minimal aesthetic
Plant care or pet care applications
avoid_for: Applications needing a dark or premium aesthetic
UIs that require tactile or skeuomorphic elements
